divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside of my apartment and I looked up to look at the stars. There were some clouds, but I saw the blinking light of an airplane moving regularly up ahead. When I looked West, I saw a light that was significantly larger than the plane, but still flying at a decent altitude. It was moving significantly faster than a plane. It was far too large and not nearly fast enough to be a shooting star. It flew like it was being navigated and was not flying in an orbital path like a satellite. It moved to the clouds, and when it got to them it disappeared. At the time I believed it was just hidden by the clouds, which it may have been, but the more I think about it, the more I think it just disappeared. This had me a little shaken up because of the recent sightings of a UFO in Texas that has been on the news. I saw one video that CNN ran of the UFO that was not well shot, but if that was the UFO they were seeing, the UFO I saw was identical to it. I have seen planes, helicopters, shooting stars and satellites, but I have never seen anything like this before.
Summary: Large Light, too low and way too fast to be a plane, not a shooting star or satellite.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Bloomington
There were no other sightings in Bloomington on or around January 18th 2008
